name: Bug Brain
description:
WHAT IS THIS THING????

This is a game where you, the player, try to convince a cockroach it's driving you, the car.

I made all the assets in this game except for the pixel nostalgia shader and the typing sound effect.

This game was solo developed in 1 (one) week.

Yes, that means it is I doing the cockroach hissing.

Typing sound from: 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/keyboard-typ...
